table.name: ob_release_instruction
table.description: This table is linked at the line item level. It identifies the line item and how much quantity to release against that line item in the base order. It provides further instructions to the create_order_release process in GC3. A build_shipment_process in GC3 then takes this information to build the shipments against the line item order.

columns.name: OB_RELEASE_INSTR_GID
columns.description: The GID for the release instruction associated to the order base line.

columns.name: OB_RELEASE_INSTR_XID
columns.description: The XID for the release instruction.

columns.name: ORDER_BASE_GID
columns.description: The order base GID associated with the release instruction.

columns.name: OB_LINE_GID
columns.description: The order base line GID that is the source of demand for this release instruction to be processed.

columns.name: OB_RELEASE_INSTRUCTION_SEQ
columns.description: The sequence number (key) associated with the release instruction.

columns.name: QUANTITY_QUALIFIER_GID
columns.description: The quantity qualifier dimension to be used for this instruction - such as weight, volume or count.

columns.name: IS_PROCESSED
columns.description: A Y/N indicator specifying that the release instruction was processed to create an order release line.

columns.name: SOURCE_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The source location GID for the pickup of the order base ship unit.

columns.name: DEST_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The destination location GID for the delivery of the order base ship unit.

columns.name: EARLY_DELIVERY_DATE
columns.description: The earliest date when the item can be picked up. If a value is specified here it overrides that one defined on the order base line.

columns.name: LATE_DELIVERY_DATE
columns.description: The latest date when the item can be picked up. If a value is specified here it overrides that one defined on the order base line.

columns.name: EARLY_PICKUP_DATE
columns.description: The earliest date when the item can be delivered. If a value is specified here it overrides that one defined on the order base line.

columns.name: LATE_PICKUP_DATE
columns.description: The latest date when the item can be picked delivered. If a value is specified here it overrides that one defined on the order base line.

columns.name: RELEASE_DATE
columns.description: The date the release instruction is to be processed.

columns.name: WEIGHT_VALUE
columns.description: The weight for the release instruction.

columns.name: WEIGHT_VALUE_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The weight unit of measure.

columns.name: WEIGHT_VALUE_BASE
columns.description: The weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: VOLUME_VALUE
columns.description: The volume for the release instruction.

columns.name: VOLUME_VALUE_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The volume unit of measure.

columns.name: VOLUME_VALUE_BASE
columns.description: The volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: UNIT_VALUE
columns.description: The unit count if the instruction in packaged item count based.

columns.name: TAG1
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color or code number.

columns.name: TAG2
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color or code number.

columns.name: TAG3
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color or code number.

columns.name: TAG4
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color or code number.

columns.name: FLAGGED_FOR_DELETE
columns.description: A Y/N indicator specifying that the release instruction can be deleted by an agent or user defined process.

columns.name: TOTAL_WEIGHT
columns.description: The total weight of the ship units for this release instruction.

columns.name: TOTAL_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The total weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The total weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_VOLUME
columns.description: The total volume of the ship units for this release instruction.

columns.name: TOTAL_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The total volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The total volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: The ship unit count value that can be copied to the order release for a specific case of handling line based releases with some limited ship unit information.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_HANDLING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The transport handling unit for the ship Unit count value that can be copied to the order release for a specific case of handling line based releases with some limited ship unit information.

columns.name: IS_AUTO_RELEASE
columns.description: A Y/N indicator to create the order release ship unit from the release instruction that comes in with the order base ship unit initially.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: SHIP_WITH_GROUP
columns.description: The ship with group identifier that is added to the order release to group them together onto the same shipment.

columns.name: OB_SU_RELEASE_INSTRUCTION_GID
columns.description: The order base ship unit release instruction GID that is used for the order configuration type of directed pack. Here you supply the line level information together with the ship unit instructions for creating the order release ship unit from this instruction instead of prepack, autocalc, or one to one.
